summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in Charge of the Criminal Division forwarding an update document about Jeffrey Epstein, sent on August 27, 2019. It appears to be internal law enforcement communication regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 27, 2019, forwarding an update on Jeffrey Epstein.
The email is from an FBI Special Agent in Charge of the Criminal Division, indicating active law enforcement involvement.
The attached document is titled 'JeffreyEpstein_update_8.26.19.docx', suggesting it was created the previous day.
The communication is internal, marked as 'FlliMe', which may be a typo or code for a specific FBI field office or division.
